attributes.action: Create a Public Holiday to celebrate the return to the UK of Rachael Lightbown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rachael left these shores about 8 years ago to start a new life in Canada. Fortunately for the UK, Rachael has decided to return here in October.
Rachael’s warm, bubbly and exhilarating personality will be a great asset to this country. Lancashire will be an even friendlier place with Rachael’s smiley, happy, caring and helpful nature.
All her many friends and relatives look forward to seeing her soon.

rejection.details: Request from creator for e-petition to be withdrawn.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
